pullRequest.title: Add `RequestScopedMdc` for request-scoped MDC properties

nodes.bodyText: Isn't it better to always put unmodifiableMap to the context and return the map without making it unmodifiable? because the implementation supposes that reading is a lot than writing?
I'm wondering we should add owdAttr to RequestContext so that we do not have to check the instance all the time. 🤔

commit.message: Address the comment from @ikhoon / Remove redundant `unmodifiableMap()`

nodes.bodyText: Question: Is it intended to return the modifiable map?
